statements: UPDATE sentiment_monitor SET sentiment_score = 0.75 WHERE message_id = 12345;
UPDATE sentiment_monitor SET message_text = 'Updated message' WHERE user_id = 67890;
UPDATE sentiment_monitor SET sentiment_score = 0.8, timestamp = '2022-01-10 12:30:00' WHERE message_id = 101 AND user_id = 501;
UPDATE sentiment_monitor SET message_text = 'This is an updated message.', sentiment_score = 0.9 WHERE user_id = 502 AND timestamp < '2022-01-15 10:00:00';
UPDATE forum_sentiments SET sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE id = 101
UPDATE chatroom_sentiments SET sentiment_score = -0.5, message_content = 'Updated message' WHERE user_id = 201
UPDATE forum_sentiments SET sentiment_score = 0.8, message_text = 'Great feedback!' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE chatroom_sentiments SET user_id = 101, sentiment_score = 0.5 WHERE id = 3
UPDATE forum_posts SET author='Alice', message='Updated message for post 1' WHERE post_id=1;
UPDATE chatroom_messages SET sender='Bob', message='Nice chat!' WHERE message_id=2;
UPDATE forum_posts SET author='Alice', message='Updated message from Alice' WHERE post_id=12345;
UPDATE sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score=0.75, post_id=54321 WHERE analysis_id=98765;
UPDATE forum_messages SET sentiment_score = 0.75, message_text = 'Updated message text' WHERE message_id = 'aa9b3e87-1253-4cf8-8401-7c04b8eec8fb';
UPDATE chatroom_messages SET message_text = 'New chatroom message', sentiment_score = 0.85 WHERE message_id = 'e19e39f1-723a-4fab-b849-7a6d5fc94a90';
UPDATE forum_messages SET message_text = 'Updated message text for Forum', sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE author_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000'
UPDATE market_trends SET trend_name = 'New Trend Name', trend_description = 'Description of the new trend', trend_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE trend_id = '7acaadd6-8edd-4be2-8272-f91e0659461b'
UPDATE ForumMessages SET message_text = 'New message text' WHERE message_id = 101;
UPDATE ChatMessages SET user_id = 201, timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE message_id = 301;
UPDATE ForumMessages SET message_text = 'New message text', timestamp = '2022-10-15 14:30:00' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE ChatMessages SET user_id = 5, timestamp = '2022-10-15 15:45:00' WHERE message_id = 10;
